sub_title: Consultant specializing in Child Protection, Child Safeguarding and Children’s Participation
summary:
Career Profile Summary:
An experienced senior level professional with over 30 years in the human and child rights field at global and regional (Africa) levels in both development and humanitarian contexts.
Recognised for her global and regional leadership, combining field experience with in depth- subject matter expertise in child protection, children’s participation and child safeguarding programming and advocacy. 
Highly skilled in strategic planning, capacity building, organisational research, evidence and learning and leading teams to deliver quality results on time.
Passionate about making a difference.

Signature Strengths: 
High level technical leadership expertise and experience in the child protection, child safeguarding and children’s participation sectors, including leadership and coordination of thematic and project teams, strategy development, planning and management, advocacy, research and evidence, learning and knowledge management, training, capacity building and the production of key publications.
A results- and solutions-focused strategic thinker with the ability to think ‘out of the box’ and to exercise conscious and motivational leadership and mentoring. A senior team leader and team builder with the ability to bring people together to perform to their maximum capacity.
Extensive experience of working in and with INGOs, UN agencies and human and child rights institutions and mechanisms at global, regional and country levels, with strong professional networks globally as well as the ability to focus on what is needed to provide context driven field support. 
Recognised advocacy experience and high level representation in international arenas with the ability to champion, position and profile a thematic sector and organisation.
A skilled and enthusiastic communicator, mobiliser and influencer.
Works transparently and collaboratively, is able to handle conflict in a constructive way and is willing to challenge tradition and routine if it stands in the way of progress.
Fluent in English and French and semi-fluent in Spanish and Dutch.

profile_positions.title: Interim Programme Director Can’t Wait to Learn

profile_positions.company: Proteknôn Foundation for Innovation and Learning
profile_positions.description: Consultant specializing in Child Protection, Child Safeguarding and Children’s Participation
profile_positions.title: Senior Associate

profile_positions.description: Led global Child Protection strategic thinking and a global network of technical experts
profile_positions.title: Interim Global Director, Child Protection

profile_positions.description: The same role with a change of title and stronger link to CP regional advisors (5). From November 2020-October 2021 led the ‘integration’ pillar in Save the Children’s Safe Back to School global priority working across Education, including Education in Emergencies, Health and Nutrition, Child Poverty, Child Protection and MHPSS.
profile_positions.title: Head of Programmes Child Protection

profile_positions.description: Led program development, quality and impact in the Child Protection team/sector within Save the Children, with a focus on program innovation and adaptation; Responsible for technical excellence and leadership, the development of effective and evidence-based programmatic approaches, research, evidence, knowledge management and results-based programming, communication, networking and representation, capacity and professional development in the sector; Worked closely with advocacy to ensure that advocacy and campaign strategies are informed by the latest program evidence and learning; Had a deputizing function for the Director Child Protection and was part of the extended senior management team in the Program Quality and Impact department; Managed the program portfolio in the global Child Protection core team.
profile_positions.title: Deputy Director, Child Protection

profile_positions.description: Knowledge generation, utilisation and communication: responsible for the design of quality evidence-based child protection programmes and approaches; for developing child protection thematic expertise; and for child protection monitoring, evaluation & learning to understand impact.
profile_positions.title: Africa Representative Child Protection Global Theme-Senior Advisor Knowledge Management & Learning

profile_positions.description: Provided strategic Pan-African leadership to the child protection sector internally and externally; Identified and pursued strategic opportunities to increase the scope and quality and to strengthen Save the Children’s child protection portfolio in Africa; Supported country offices in the design of child protection strategies (programs and advocacy); Promoted child protection knowledge management, learning and participatory research agendas across Africa; Represented the child protection sector and advocated in relevant global, regional and country fora; Worked strongly and closely across and with other thematic sectors, identifying opportunities for integrated programming and inspiring and influencing Global Themes to work together; Provided pivotal leadership of the child protection sector in the East-Southern Africa UNICEF-Save the Children Joint Framework for Collaboration 2015-end 2016; Promoted coordination and facilitated collaboration across the work of Save the Children child protection regional advisors and Members in Africa.
profile_positions.title: Africa Representative Child Protection Global Theme, Save the Children

profile_positions.description:
Provided strategic leadership to the child protection sector in West Central Africa (WCA) internally (Save the Children) and externally (inter-agency); Identified and pursued strategic opportunities to increase and strengthen the scope and quality of Save the Children’s child protection portfolio in WCA in close collaboration with Save the Children members and Save the Children International country and regional offices; Supported country offices in the design of child protection strategies (programs and advocacy), supporting alignment to Save the Children’s global child protection priorities; Promoted child protection knowledge management, learning, exchange and participatory research agendas across WCA; Pioneered the development of participatory research with children, caregivers and other key stakeholders to better understand informal alternative care mechanisms (specifically kinship care) in 5 countries: DRC, Niger, Nigeria, Senegal and Sierra Leone and supported its adaptation and replication in East and Southern Africa and with Syrian refugees in Jordan.
•	Worked strongly and closely across and with other thematic sectors, identifying opportunities for integrated programming and inspiring and influencing Global Themes to work together.
•	Represented the child protection sector and advocated in relevant global, regional and country fora.
•	Promoted coordination and facilitated collaboration across the work of Save the Children child protection regional advisors and Members in WCA.
profile_positions.title: Regional Representative Child Protection Global Theme West & Central Africa, Save the Children

profile_positions.description: Led War Child Holland team responsible for the timely development, implementation and monitoring of an effective Child Safeguarding Policy throughout the organisation, at head office and in the field; Spearheaded the development of quality and effective child protection programming throughout the organisation; Oversaw the effective integration and monitoring of an inclusion perspective throughout War Child Holland’s programming and organisation; Delivered a strategy for effective and meaningful children’s participation throughout the organisation; Key member of the advocacy unit responsible for the timely development, implementation and monitoring of a global advocacy strategy for War Child Holland; Coordinated child protection staff at country level and a team of child safeguarding focal points in head office and line managed child participation and inclusion advisors at head office.
profile_positions.title: Child Protection Coordinator
